cab.content: Printed for the War Cabinet. January 1941.NTSECRET. Copy No.W.P. (41) 12.January 17th, 1941.TO BE KEPT UNDER LOCK AND KEY.It is requested that special care may be taken toensure the secrecy of this document.28WAR CABINET.DISCLOSURE TO THE UNITED STATES OF SECRET information relating TO SUPPLY MATTERS.Memorandum by the Minister of Aircraft Production.I PROPOSE to the Cabinet that the powers and duties of the Committeeon Disclosure of Secrets to U.S.A. be transferred forthwith to the North AmericanSupply Committee, of which Sir Andrew Duncan is Chairman.The personnel of the two Committees is the same. The functions of the two committees are closely related, one being, indeed, a natural extension of the other.And it would make for the easy, swift and efficient despatch of public business if both Committees were brought under one Chairman and were served by one secretariat.B.Ministry of Aircraft Production,January 17, 1941.[22137]^ ---,---------- 15
